111.content:
(Side note: Author did not specify my gender, so I'm using my rl gender.)

I like to wear big, baggy shirts along with fitted pants, leggings, or skirts. (Yes, I am female.) So I grab one of my tunic-length shirts which suddenly looks like a maxi dress on me. (That's what we called them when I was a teen.) It's way too baggy on me now though, so I add a belt at the waist draped the excess fabric over the top of the belt for a blouson style. Not my everyday preference as it makes me resemble a sack of spuds, but I digress. I cinch the belt but soon regret that action when it pinches my morning bladder. I need to pee in the worst way but as I reach the bathroom, which felt miles away, I wonder how I am going to accomplish the act itself. The toilet is one of those tall handicap-accessible fixtures. On a regular day, it works just fine for us. Mom and Dad are tall like me and my baby brother isn't potty trained yet, so nobody even notices its height. But now, at two feet short, I can barely even reach the wastebasket. So where am I supposed to go? Where is my old potty chair when I need it? Is there anything here that I can pee into? Aha! I found......

I keep peeing and emptying the pail into the bathtub. By the time my family returns, we'll have a golden ocean. We can call it Pee World. Okay, now how do I go about the rest of my life until my family returns? What about breakfast?

11113.content:
Thinking about what to do for food you felt your stomach grumble with hunger. "Why me." You whine and sigh as you leave the bathroom and walk down the hall to the kitchen. What seemed a short distance was now a lot longer. "I need to find a way to get through this..." You spoke lightly to yourself as you came to a stop staring at the fridge that now looked huge to you. "At this size, I shouldn't need much." you thought with a bit of joy to the fact that you wouldn't need to find a lot of food. Tugging at the door a few times before it finally opened and you stared inside at the food. The pouch of Babybel Cheese sat on the shelf of the door and caught your eyes. You loved them and smiled as it was your height. Reaching in and grabbing two of them you closed the door after taking a bottle of water as well. You started to eat the first Cheese and smiled at the taste that you enjoyed so much. You was wondering around the house until you ended up at your baby brother's door and stared in his room at the changing table that was next to his crib.

After leaving his room you wondered off to the attic and was looking at a box with your name on it. It had all your old clothes and toys from when you was a baby. "I wore this back then?" You asked as you held up a very frilly soft white dress that had pale pink frills all over it. Holding it in front of you and sighing you noticed it would fit before placing it down and pulling out other clothes. A pair of jeans and a barbie shirt, a pair of black tights with a blue skirt and shirt that had hello kitty on it. " I rather not wear these... but they would fit better then what I am wearing now..." You sighed heavily as you stared at everything and recalled your trouble with the toilet and was dreading what it meant for you. You was happy to be potty trained and have no need for diapers and to wear one seemed to not really make you feel any better about your situation. "I know I don't want to but I might have no other choice..." You whine and stare at the baby clothes. "I am not a baby..." You almost yell before running out of the room.
11113.title: You're on your own, dudette

choices: time passes with out you noticing

111131.content:
Storming down the hall you pass your baby brother's room again and stop and stare emptily into the room trying to hold back tears of annoyance and humiliation. "I am not a baby, No matter what." You moan and clinch your fist as you start to lower your head. " I am not." You say before starting to walk in towards the changing table. "I am not doing this because I want to..." You growl as you wipe the tears from your eyes. " I am not peeing in the bucket all day." You claim and went about pulling everything out that you will need.

After you was done and had finished placing the second tape in place you stared almost in hatred at the padding that was now hugging your crotch. How it fit perfectly and the bulging form it was to much for her to stand. Standing up you whine at the crinkling sounds that was coming from it. "I hate you." She muttered to the diaper and then went back up into the attic and shifted through the clothes a second time. eventually picking to wear the tights and hello kitty shirt and skirt.

Once you was fully dressed you made your way back down and was wondering around the house trying to think on how to undo what ever was done to you. Trying to find a reason that you was now so small, and hating every step taken in the diaper for it made walking weird, it was more of a waddle then normal walking for you couldn't close your legs properly.
111131.title: put a diaper on then go back pick an outfit to ...

1111311.content: As you was waddling around the house in your old baby clothes and one of your brother's diapers, time was passing and with out you knowing how long it took you to get anywhere. By time you made it to your room after taking a little trip around the house you stared at your clock and noticed a few hours had passed. "So it takes me that long to do anything?" You sighed and plopped down on your diapered bottom and whined at the feeling of it and the sound that came from your landing. "Stupid thing." You moan and sit there thinking. "How am I going to take care of myself if I am so small?" You crossed your arms and stared at the floor trying to think things through. "Maybe if I get them to come over and help..." You thought about the twins that you knew of that had a some what similar problem all their life you guessed. Ryan was 20 and only stood 2'5" and Rain was 3' tall but somehow they found a way to get through such a life. Looking across the floor at your cell phone that was laid on the floor. "I might hate this." You stated as you recalled that Ryan had this crush on you and sighed as you crawled across the floor and picked up your phone.

11121.content:
Although diapering yourself was a bit more difficult than your baby brother, you manage to get it on fine just as the floodgates open and you fill it up. You poke the front and see that it can hold more so there is not point in going commando when you may have to put it back on to go later. You're not sure what is going on, but you think that it might be a good idea to stay inside. At this size, anyone could be dangerous and seeing a toddler walking down the street wearing an oversized "dress" might be a sure fire way to get your parents arrested.
Considering the options, you could try calling your parents, but they probably wouldn't recognize your voice, or believe you anyway. You might be better off choosing to wait it out until they got home and could help you in person.
11121.title: Yes.

111212.content:
(At some point we ended up as a female, so I'm just gonna roll with it)
Figuring that you might as well get comfortable, you go to your brother's room to find something more appropriate to wear. You slip the baggy shirt off and look at your body. It's really strange to see your adult body being this tiny and wearing a wet diaper. You start rummaging through the lower drawer, as its the only one you can reach without climbing on something and while a toddler can fall all day and bounce back, a 22 year old would probably just break her arm or something.

In the drawer you find clothes that your mom doesn't put on your brother anymore, mostly baby onesies and the like. Your parents didn't want to know the sex of the baby when your brother was born so they had one or two clothing items for boys and girls and luckily you found a poofy white dress made for a newborn that you thought would look quite cute on you. It hung just above your sagging diaper. You slipped some yellow baby socks on your feet to protect you from the cold floor, but knew you wouldn't find shoes to fit your shrunken adult body. You giggled as you looked in the mirror in the corner. It was an unfortunate situation that you found yourself in, but dammit you sure were adorable.

You go back into the living room and grab the remote from the coffee table, turning on the tv. An hour or so later your tiny tummy rumbles. "I guess I need to find something to eat."
you walk to the kitchen and look around at the overly large appliances. You could try and open the fridge or check the lower cabinets.
111212.title: Wait it out and find something to do

1112122.content:
You peek in the cabinets where your family keeps the cereal and grab a box of Raisin Bran. You resign yourself to eating it dry, figuring you probably couldn't lift the gallon of milk, if you could even get up to it on the top shelf of the refrigerator, and walk back to the living room to snack on your breakfast while watching tv.
Time passes slowly and you find yourself too bored to focus on daytime television so you go exploring through the house. You take a look at the game system in your room, but your little hands aren't capable of playing complex games designed for adults and teens. In your parents room, they keep everything of interest up too high for your brother to reach, so you go back to his room to find some toys or something. You open the toy chest and find several simple puzzles and blocks, as well as some dolls and stuffed animals.
A few hours of reliving your childhood later and your stomach starts to rumble again. This time it's a much different kind of rumble. Peeing yourself was one thing, but pooping in a diaper seems like a bit much. You could try and find something to go in, but honestly what's the point?

There you watch her buy onesies, overalls and other baby clothes for you to wear. After being done with clothes shopping she goes to a second store and heads straight to the baby section and starts picking up packs of diapers and pull-ups, wipes, baby bottles, pacifiers and everything else you'll need, even a training potty for you to use.

You and Jake play with some toy cars, you feel you're getting even more into the toddler mode and are actually enjoying yourself. Your playing is interrupted, but why?

11311211222122212122.content:
"Boys, time for dinner," says your mother.
You two run into the kitchen, where your mother is setting the table, with two regular-sized plates for herself and your father, and two toddler-sized plates for you and Jake.
Just then, your dad arrives home from work.
"I'm back," he says, "Something smells good. Hello, Sue, hello, Jake and hello...who are you?"
"I'm Fred, Dad," you say, "I know it sounds crazy but I woke up like this and I don't know if or when or how I'll grow back, but I asked Mom to treat me like I'm a toddler until that happens."
"And you did it, Sue?!" says your dad, rather taken aback.
"Yes," says your mom, "I rather missed him as a baby."

Is your dad OK with his wife babying their oldest son?

With tears in your eyes, you charge at John with your arms out in front of you. John bends down and scoops you into his arms, lifting you close to his chest with your head at his shoulder.

“Richard, are you ok? What happened?”

“I-I don’t know… I-I just woke up today like this. I don’t know. What if I’m stuck like this? W-what if my mind starts going away? Wha-what would my parents think? Wha-wha-what about my girlfriend?” You become more and more scared about, well, everything. Your entire world has changed suddenly and it’s too much too soon! You break down and start crying into John’s shirt, bawling your eyes out. You don’t know what else to do; all you can do now is cry.

John, however, knows what he can do. Cradling your diminutive form close to him, he hugs you close and gently rubs your back, trying his best to calm you down. You, in turn, hug him as tightly as you could and continue to cry. You feel better with his close comforting and his gentle warmth. It was surprising to you how he was so good at this. He barely met your little brother, and he never talked about having and little siblings. Maybe it’s just because you were scared.

You slowly but surely stop crying, your tears turning into soft whimpers. John, noticing this, moves downstairs to the living room and sits with you on the couch. “You want me to put you down so you sit down on the couch,” John asks you. You shake your head and say no; you didn’t want to let go, you just needed someone, anyone, to be there for you and he was the only one you got. You needed his warmth, and his love, and his protection. John rocks you in his arms until you fall into a deep slumber… After an hour or so you wake up to find that

You enter your younger brother's room and look around. It doesn't take long before you spot his changing table and all of the necessary supplies. Walking over to the changing table you begin to have second thoughts. Maybe this isn't such a good idea. What if your parents come back? Your mind is racing a mile a minute as you open up a drawer and pull out a diaper.

Looking at the changing table, you feel intimidated by its large size. Back when you were tall, you would have had no problems climbing on top; however, your weight always kept you from attempting to do so. Hoisting yourself up will be the easiest way to access the changing table, but you could always diaper yourself whilst on the floor.

11511.content:
The top of the changing table isn't very high and you feel that even with your small stature you reach the top. You toss the diaper up onto the changing table before grabbing a hold of the table's sides. You take a deep breath, count to three, and then start lifting your body up. As you lift yourself higher the changing table becomes unstable and starts to fall towards you. Panicking, you let go of the changing table as it falls onto you. A sharp pain can be felt in the back of your head as you slam onto the floor. The room goes black as you lose consciousness.

It could have been several minutes, or several hours, but you finally regain consciousness. Unfortunately, being shrunk was not a dream. You are still two feet tall; however, now you are dressed appropriately. You are wearing an orange onesie with black tiger stripes. Underneath your onesie is a disposable diaper. Who in the world could have dressed you this way? You ponder this for a while before you remember that you had not only invited a friend over, but that you had secretly copied your house key. Who did you give your duplicate key to?

"Mommy, Fred's shrunken down to Jake's size and he put on his diaper!!", she said. "Emily, you're not supposed to be here," says Sue the mother. "Firstly, how on Earth did Fred shrink, if that is Fred, secondly, you were supposed to stay so that you don't see what you were getting for your birthday, and thirdly, if that is Fred, then he's here so who's going to look after Tony?!".

What solution do they come up with?
P.S. Tony was mentioned in another character so I have included him to tidy things up a bit. Fred has three siblings: Jake (2), Tony (6), and Emily (8).
